title: Failed to Connect
body:
Hello,

I am having trouble getting into a game, The game was working fine just yesterday and previously however today when I tried to play a game it just wouldn't let me in. 

After the game launches it goes to a black screen (supposed to be load screen) and after a while it has an error box saying "failed to connect"

I've tried retrying, restarting the game,  restarting the computer, using wired and wireless connections but It's still the same message.

replies.body:
Try goign through the steps here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

If that doesn't work, submit a ticket to player support detailing your issue and they should be able to help you: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new (Having logs from the Hextech Repair Tool will help greatly with this)
